original_text: After that, Jephthah returned to his home in Mizpah. As he arrived, his daughter came out to meet him. She was dancing and making music with a tambourine. She was Jephthah's only child. He had no other son or daughter.
korean_text: 입다가 미스바에 있는 자기 집에 이를 때에 보라 그의 딸이 소고를 잡고 춤추며 나와서 영접하니 이는 그의 무남독녀라

sentences.original_text: After that, Jephthah returned to his home in Mizpah
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 입다는 미스바에 있는 자기 집으로 돌아왔습니다

sentences.original_text: As he arrived, his daughter came out to meet him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 도착했을 때, 그의 딸이 그를 만나러 나왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and making music with a tambourine
He had no other son or daughter
